post.title: Islam and the Future of Tolerance on ZeroNet
post.body: Everyone read [Islam and the Future of Tolerance](http://127.0.0.1:43110/13XG2xb8jGHtb2DKW24ffpKvt7L5rswnwA/?Post:2:Islam+and+the+Future+of+Tolerance+by+Maajid+Nawaz,+Sam+Harris) by [Maajid Nawaz](http://maajidnawaz.com/) and [Sam Harris](http://samharris.org/)

post.title: SJWs & The Regressive Left
post.body: How many of you are aware of the regressive left?
